description.p: Spoken by Shou. It has roots in draconic, so anybody who knows draconic would have advantage on interpreting KTS.

Spoken by those from Kara-Tur who intend to trade with Faerunians. The language is a coarse mix of commonspeak - which is itself a mix of elvish and dwarvish - and KTS, and is only seriously used by merchants and privateers. It has roots in draconic, so anybody who knows draconic would have advantage on interpreting KTT
Spoken sages and arcanists of Kara-Tur. Although historically known as the language of the gods, it has fallen out of popular use.
